title: Billy, le Hamster Cowboy
overview: Growing up in the Wild West and raised on the exciting stories told by his father, Billy with his cowboy outfit has a burning desire to hit the trail! And since every new day presents him with an opportunity to go on an adventure worthy of the greatest cowboys, he is determined not to miss outâ€¦ He takes with him his faithful friend Jean-Claude the worm, and his accomplice Suzie, the stone marten, and off they go!
